definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
scoundrel with an honest demeanor/see also 蔫兒壞|蔫儿坏[nian1 r5 huai4]

sentences.english: And how would you deal with this brigand?
sentences.chinese: 那你要怎麼對付這個土匪呢？

sentences.english: Like an animal at bay, the bandit chieftain laid about in desperation.
sentences.chinese: 土匪頭子困獸猶鬥，在絕望中向四面八方亂打一氣。

sentences.english: The brigands of this area have been annihilated by the Army.
sentences.chinese: 軍隊剿絕了這一帶的土匪。

sentences.english: The results, along with the master went up into the mountain to uncle et al found the bandits jubilation.
sentences.chinese: 結果，王福隨着舅老爺上山才發現土匪山上一片歡騰。

sentences.english: You are sage while your brother is the head of bandit.
sentences.chinese: 柳下先生你是社會賢達，而令弟卻爲土匪頭。

sentences.english: He's a malicious and malevolent malefactor and gangster.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個惡毒的，壞心腸的罪犯，土匪。

sentences.english: The same is true for the bandit infested village quests .
sentences.chinese: 這同樣適用於村的土匪出沒的追求。

sentences.english: The brigands demanded tribute from passing vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 土匪向過往車輛勒索錢財。

sentences.english: They fought bravely to clean up the bandits.
sentences.chinese: 他們英勇作戰以肅清土匪。

sentences.english: Old duck got a contact with the bandits, he killed the contact person.
sentences.chinese: 老鴨拿到了和土匪的聯絡圖，他殺死了聯絡人。

sentences.english: Like an animal at bay, the bandit chieftain laid about him in desperation.
sentences.chinese: 土匪頭子困獸猶鬥，在絕望中向四面八方亂打一氣。

sentences.english: The policeman confiscated the robber's pistol.
sentences.chinese: 警察沒收了土匪的手槍。

sentences.english: How would you deal with this brigand?
sentences.chinese: 你要如何對付這個土匪？

sentences.english: The local bandits extorted money from the villagers…
sentences.chinese: 土匪向村民們勒索錢財。

sentences.english: You can bribe bandits ( Scorchers and Bandit Lord party) to join your party.
sentences.chinese: 你可以賄賂土匪加入您的隊伍。

sentences.english: The bandits broke into the jewelry and stole near all the valuable necklaces.
sentences.chinese: 土匪們闖進了珠寶店盜走了幾乎所有值錢的項鍊。

definition: true hero of Greenwood (refers to popular hero in Robin Hood style)
to break into a house for robbery (idiom)
horse thief/(old) group of horse-mounted bandits
